1.character_design_description: Space Academy graduate and much loved Capt'n of the Starship.

2.character_design_description: Space Academy graduate and much loved Capt'n of the Starship.

3.character_design_description: Space Academy graduate and much loved Capt'n of the Starship.

4.character_design_description: Space Academy graduate and much loved Capt'n of the Starship.

5.character_design_description: Space Academy graduate and much loved Capt'n of the Starship.

6.character_design_description: Space Academy graduate and much loved Capt'n of the Starship.

7.character_design_description: Even the infinite void of space cannot hide wrongdoers from justice!

8.character_design_description: The chosen engineer, foretold in engineering legends to bring balance to the camshaft.

9.character_design_description: A football fan, following his favourite team across the cosmos!

10.character_design_description: A man born from a coconut.

11.character_design_description: A beautiful alien seductress. If you're into that kind of thing.

12.character_design_description: Makes other mad scientists look sane. Programmed himself a robot body using only Linux.

13.character_design_description: A slimy alien captain, just itching for a reason to fight.

14.character_design_description: Visiri with evolved manoeuvring mechanics, well suited to space combat.

16.character_design_description: This idealistic young man dreams of one day ruling the universe in a blood-bathed campaign of terror.

18.character_design_description: An artist on a quest to paint the most beautiful view in the universe.

20.character_design_description: A seeker of enlightenment, no matter how far he has to go.

21.character_design_description: Artificial life, superior technology. Pay no attention to the man inside.

22.character_design_description: A humble midshipman, keen to serve the captain.

23.character_design_description: A hopeless romantic, looking to find love on an exotic world.

24.character_design_description: A rough exterior hides a sensitive heart in pursuit of happiness.

25.character_design_description: Wants to either marry a president, or BE a president. She isn't choosy about which.

26.character_design_description: Not particularly good at anything, but not terrible either. At least he tries hard.

27.character_design_description: Has a shockingly strong air of authority for such a low-ranked crew.

28.character_design_description: This assassin audaciously claims responsibility for everyone who has ever died.

29.character_design_description: This strange creature is a massive fan of humans, and asks for an autograph from every one she meets.

31.character_design_description: A guy from the animal rights society.

33.character_design_description: Sometimes, a research project will take you places you really weren't counting on...

34.character_design_description: Loves his boring office job, he can't wait for Monday!

35.character_design_description: Loves to guide others, even if he doesn't really know what he's doing.

37.character_design_description: Slayer of bugs, restorer of code. His friends call him TJ, but you can call him Sir.

38.character_design_description: This guy isn't actually a space explorer, he just got hopelessly lost on the way home from the store.

39.character_design_description: A stranger in this universe, the elf hails from a fantastical realm of monsters and magic.

40.character_design_description: A retired star captain, always ready to show a newbie the ropes.

41.character_design_description: Part-time SavySoda Emergency Response Personnel. Some wonder if she is actually part-robot too.

42.character_design_description: Don't even try to argue with her, it will not end well for you.

43.character_design_description: Not quite a doctor, but he'll still keep your crew alive.

44.character_design_description: Quite possibly the least interesting person you will ever meet.

45.character_design_description: Conscripted troopers, ready to storm across the battlefields of the galaxy.

46.character_design_description: He clearly wants you to ask about his new look. Don't.

47.character_design_description: His target is somewhere out there. Somewhere...

48.character_design_description: Loved by teachers, reviled by his peers.

49.character_design_description: He's got a bone to pick with you...

50.character_design_description: An invaluable dispensary of sage advice and musty smells.

52.character_design_description: That's one small step for man, one giant leap for a mobile game.

53.character_design_description: Graduated head of his class from evil business school.

54.character_design_description: An astronaut trainee with the Federation. Collects colourful lint samples.

56.character_design_description: A huge fan of Elvis, trying to track down the aliens who kidnapped him.

57.character_design_description: In training to be a professional pick-up artist.

58.character_design_description: The first monkey to successfully captain a ship.

59.character_design_description: Still lives in his parents basement.

60.character_design_description: Appreciates a good pair of socks.

61.character_design_description: Amateur weightlifter, dreams of bigger things.

62.character_design_description: Pleasant, shy, loves death metal and punk music.

63.character_design_description: A martial artist out to prove herself the equal of any man.

64.character_design_description: The girl next door, who somehow managed to follow you into space.

65.character_design_description: A cheerleader by profession, but willing and able to pummel anyone who looks at her wrong.

66.character_design_description: Does everything by the book. Not a lot of fun at parties.

67.character_design_description: A graduate of the Star Academy. Rumour has it she and Xin are dating.

68.character_design_description: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. She just does magic though.

69.character_design_description: She claims to have a vampire somewhere in her heritage. You suspect she just doesn't like going outside.

70.character_design_description: An internet influencer who got too famous, seeking the anonymity of space.

71.character_design_description: Keeps an asteroid in her garage.

72.character_design_description: Once stole someone's gum. From out of their mouth.

73.character_design_description: So named for her gross sticky hands.

74.character_design_description: A merciless soldier of the mysterious Grays.

77.character_design_description: Too many bugs will cause your game to crash. Just this one is fine, though.

78.character_design_description: The best skater in the Proxima Centauri system, she's saving up to go compete on Earth.

79.character_design_description: A golden government troop! Like a regular troop, but with a better paycheck.

80.character_design_description: Hangs out at the local basketball court.

82.character_design_description: Always on one business trip or another, he hasn't seen his family in years.

84.character_design_description: Gets his shirt off at every opportunity.

85.character_design_description: The most popular guy in the office. Can't get enough hot dogs.

86.character_design_description: He's not the messiah, he's a very naughty boy!

87.character_design_description: Cuddling this plush bear would be a painful mistake.

88.character_design_description: Likes to drink tea with his army friends.

91.character_design_description: Old, crotchety, kind of a perv.

92.character_design_description: An Ancient Chinese Emperor. What is he doing here!?

93.character_design_description: A powerful warrior, still hasn't worked out how to talk to girls.

94.character_design_description: They call him the Dragon Warrior, even though he is self-evidently human.

96.character_design_description: Older sister of Xiao Qiao, gifted musician and dancer.

97.character_design_description: Younger sister of Da Qiao, gifted scholar and philosopher.

98.character_design_description: Produces and distributes chocolate eggs. Best not dwell on how she makes them.

99.character_design_description: Another unpopular mascot for an interstellar chain restaurant.

100.character_design_description: The only jelly that eats you right back!

101.character_design_description: A fan of the Ardent cabal, his cosplay often gets him in trouble.

102.character_design_description: Had a hard life, but always ready to crack a smile.

104.character_design_description: Dresses up like a cat to fight crime. Mostly targets parking violations.

105.character_design_description: A cyborg made on a budget.

106.character_design_description: Runs a side business safely removing snakes from ship ventilation.

107.character_design_description: These robots are great if you want something blown up, and terrible if you don't want something blown up.

108.character_design_description: This school teacher's methods are unorthodox, but undeniably effective.

109.character_design_description: Her stern lectures about ship safety are feared even more than her sharp, sharp medical tools.

110.character_design_description: Came second place in the Paladin competition.

112.character_design_description: Always seems to have a soccer ball on his person. Where is he keeping them?

113.character_design_description: Secretly dreams of performing a slam dunk from upper orbit.

114.character_design_description: I am a machine but I know what love is! - thunder_kiss_65 (July 2016 Winner)

115.character_design_description: This star academy professor has an IQ of over 300, which makes it really hard for her to find a date.

116.character_design_description: Spent decades working out the rules of the universe... then realised he forgot to carry the one.

117.character_design_description: Built millennia ago by ancient Qtarians, these ageless machines still guard the ruins of their lost masters.

118.character_design_description: A stray kitten turned mercenary. Down to her last life due to some very bad decisions.

119.character_design_description: Used to command a vast fleet of warships. Now works at a sushi restaurant.

121.character_design_description: People are dying to get her number.

122.character_design_description: Not very talkative; he's too wrapped up in his own problems.

123.character_design_description: Working as a intern at a law firm. Won the local skip-rope competition.

124.character_design_description: Won't get off her skateboard, even when she's at work.

125.character_design_description: His parents are still convinced this is just a phase he'll eventually grow out of.

127.character_design_description: Savours those few quiet moment when her kids are at school, or eating someone.

128.character_design_description: A marketing stunt that went spectacularly wrong.

129.character_design_description: A nice guy, if you can ignore the copious shedding.

130.character_design_description: Like dark matter, he is powerful, impressive, and extremely dense.

131.character_design_description: Knows where to go for a good time.

132.character_design_description: He's got a present for ya.

133.character_design_description: Are you okay, buddy? You're looking a little green.

134.character_design_description: Delivers Soda and Fixes Bugs. Consumes nothing but energy drinks.

135.character_design_description: Widely regarded as the second most unpleasant species, right after the Grays.

137.character_design_description: Crikey! He has a pet crocodile.

138.character_design_description: Dark Matter Hero 2: Now even denser.

139.character_design_description: He's not so bad, just don't touch his car.

140.character_design_description: Tends to set off the fire alarms.

141.character_design_description: A Mechanical warrior, powered by dark matter.

142.character_design_description: I'm Mr Blue! Look at me! I'm happy to help, just don't keep me around too long...

143.character_design_description: A mysterious descendant of the long-dead Draconians.

145.character_design_description: Drank beer until DNA mutated. Developed regeneration ability.

146.character_design_description: Once a beer loving saint. Now reborn as a Starship Medic.

147.character_design_description: Favourite Food: Banana. Favourite Toy: Barbie

148.character_design_description: A Mystical Beast Hero that frequently appears in the months of April to May.

149.character_design_description: A grizzled Draconian warrior. Aren't these guys meant to be extinct?

150.character_design_description: First generation synthetic human. Spends as much time styling his hair as a real human.

151.character_design_description: Machina Project. Second Generation Synthetic Human. Loves and Cries, like a real Human.

152.character_design_description: Forever hunting for a selfie with Doge. - Blacksteed Tournament 11

153.character_design_description: Doctor trying to get home. Has a 10% chance to be randomly selected for voluntary re-accomodation in each PVP departure.

154.character_design_description: Handsome and dashing, Leylosh has devoted his life to bringing a little style to the galaxy.

155.character_design_description: Developed underwater. A powerful offensive droid.

156.character_design_description: Half man, Half god, Half Machine... does not compute...

158.character_design_description: He's mean, he's green, he's teased mercilessly at school for being a geek. It's Froggy!

159.character_design_description: Galaxy tabletop game champion and android fanboy. For some reason, everyone blames him for all their problems.

160.character_design_description: By putting on some new sunnies, this geek has finally managed to look cool.

161.character_design_description: Nobody is exactly sure what kind of animal this thing is, except that it's pretty cute.

162.character_design_description: A cybernetically enhanced soldier from the ancient Draconian empire.

163.character_design_description: Always cheerful and first to respond to those in need.

164.character_design_description: Squid's brother had a fight at the local pub. Now attending anger management.

166.character_design_description: A humble droid ready to serve its wise master.

168.character_design_description: A humble droid ready to serve its wise master.

169.character_design_description: A humble droid ready to serve its wise master.

170.character_design_description: A humble droid ready to serve its wise master.

171.character_design_description: A humble droid ready to serve its wise master.

172.character_design_description: A heavy defender droid ready to stop intruders.

173.character_design_description: A heavy defender droid ready to stop intruders.

174.character_design_description: A heavy defender droid ready to stop intruders.

175.character_design_description: A heavy defender droid ready to stop intruders.

176.character_design_description: A heavy defender droid ready to stop intruders.

177.character_design_description: An aggressive droid looking to cause havoc.

178.character_design_description: An aggressive droid looking to cause havoc.

179.character_design_description: An aggressive droid looking to cause havoc.

180.character_design_description: An aggressive droid looking to cause havoc.

181.character_design_description: An aggressive droid looking to cause havoc.

182.character_design_description: Everything he owns is made of gold. Even his clothes, somehow.

183.character_design_description: A Pirate King turned Starship Captain.

184.character_design_description: A specialised Zakian Assassin. Only 130 deployed in the galaxy.

186.character_design_description: Was CEO of a popular fruit company.

187.character_design_description: Always walking around with an iPad.

188.character_design_description: Professor Brenda is done asking nicely...

189.character_design_description: Once partied with a thousand cute cadets; now hangs around Starship staff quarters.

190.character_design_description: A female tutorial synth. Reminds you of days back at the academy.

191.character_design_description: Good with a bow, which doesn't mean much in an age of lasers.

192.character_design_description: Graduated from the Pilot academy with top grades. A quiet girl with talent.

193.character_design_description: An envoy of the Ardent cabal, cybernetically enhanced to fit the role perfectly.

194.character_design_description: You think a ninja wouldn't want to look so obvious, but here we are.

195.character_design_description: Once a star athlete, she's decided to turn her considerable talents to the business of space flight.

196.character_design_description: Many an unwary shipmate has been eaten whilst laughing at this surprisingly powerful creature.

197.character_design_description: An escapee from a top-secret Federation facility, she was gifted with the inexplicable power of pyrokinesis.

198.character_design_description: Retired from MMA fighting and joined the Starship Academy.

199.character_design_description: Hey buddy, why the long face?

200.character_design_description: A smaller droid that tries to do everything but isn't particularly good at anything.

201.character_design_description: A smaller droid that tries to do everything but isn't particularly good at anything.

203.character_design_description: Busy busy; a super fast worker. Helps Santa with gift packaging and keeps the workshop nice and clean.

204.character_design_description: Work work. Helps Santa run errands and wears a nice green hat. Only gets one day off a year.

205.character_design_description: A surprisingly skilled crew. ...For a baby, anyway.

206.character_design_description: Has 4 legs so runs twice as fast. Frequently appears in the months of November to December.

207.character_design_description: Searching the galaxy for a pair of pants that will fit right.

209.character_design_description: Bit of a hipster. Only wears designer stuff.

210.character_design_description: Nobody really knows who this old guy is...

212.character_design_description: An angry young man, always goofing around with a screwdriver.

213.character_design_description: Wants to ship his car to Mars.

214.character_design_description: A smaller droid that tries to do everything but isn't particularly good at anything.

215.character_design_description: Always holding a cup of coffee.

217.character_design_description: The ears are what gives him away. No sense of humour.

218.character_design_description: Studying the histories and technologies of species long past, ever present, and yet to come.

219.character_design_description: A beautiful, mystical creature with healing powers.

221.character_design_description: On the run from prison. If they catch him again, he's gonna fry.

223.character_design_description: A Panda Scholar with some Kung Fu skills.

224.character_design_description: You suspect that this fellow may be an alien.

225.character_design_description: You suspect that this lovely lady may be an alien.

226.character_design_description: Meowy has turned to the Dark Side and gained 2 more Lives. She finds your lack of catnip disturbing.

228.character_design_description: Documents all the cultures of the galaxy, but in a profoundly obnoxious fashion.

229.character_design_description: 3 Time Tournament Winner as of April 2018!

230.character_design_description: Ancient Meowy statue from a long lost civilization.

231.character_design_description: The ability to walk on water is pretty overrated when you're in space.

232.character_design_description: Many have died trying to save him.

233.character_design_description: An ancient and inscrutable evil, luckily very easy to distract with a ball of yarn.

234.character_design_description: Dreams of becoming a professional boxer, just as soon as he can find gloves that fit right.

235.character_design_description: A Zakian hunter, enhanced with Draconian DNA.

236.character_design_description: A Zakian hunter, enhanced with Draconian DNA.

237.character_design_description: A Starship Captain that never backs down from a fight! She takes to the front lines, boarding enemy ships and defending her crew in close quarters combat!

238.character_design_description: This Starship Captain moves with grace, and so does her ship. As long as she is in the engine room, her ship dances out of reach of many enemy missiles.

239.character_design_description: Hardy Starship Captain and wonder with a wrench. She will keep her ship fighting through the toughest of battles.

240.character_design_description: Passed the gunnery course at the academy with unprecedented scores! This Starship Captain prefers commanding from the weapons deck to standing on the bridge.

241.character_design_description: This Starship Captain excels in the field of science. He is adept at using his ship's tech systems to gain an advantage in battle.

242.character_design_description: This hot-shot Starship Captain is on of the Federation's best up-and-coming pilots. Daring and brave in the pilot's seat!

243.character_design_description: You must understand laws in order to break them. Once a scientist, now a pirate, this Starship Captain has studied the laws of the universe to exploit them to her will.

244.character_design_description: A Starship Captain that understands her ship far better than she ever understood the law. She can fix things almost as quickly as she could steal them!

245.character_design_description: This is one Starship Captain with attitude! She's not afraid to let her weapons do the talking.

246.character_design_description: This Starship Captain's mechanical skill has gotten him out of some tricky situations. He always tunes his starship's engine perfectly for dodging trouble!

247.character_design_description: An attractive aerial ace! This stylish Pirate Captain can make any ship dance through the stars like a winged ballerina!

248.character_design_description: As a seasoned Swashbuckler, this Starship Captain is not afraid to go toe-to-toe with any foe!

249.character_design_description: An expert engineer. This Starship Captain has been turning scrap to starships since he was first able to hold a spanner.

250.character_design_description: A Starship Captain capable of flying even the most rickety scrap heap... As long as there's an engine attached!

251.character_design_description: Some say that this Starship Captain can make an engine from nothing but a single piece of scrap and two bottles of gas. His Starship can dodge like no other!

252.character_design_description: The Science of Scrap is no mystery to this Starship Captain. She can have a ruined starship's electronic systems up and running before you can say That shouldn't even be possible!

253.character_design_description: Expert salvager and natural-born fighter. This is one Starship Captain who can hold her own in a fight! To her, any old scrap, from a chain to a toaster, makes the perfect improvised weapon!

254.character_design_description: A starship captain that can craft projectile weapons from just about anything. His mechanic's touch is enough to make the rustiest gun barrel rapid-fire!

256.character_design_description: A mystical crew commanding the Twin Spirits. Walks the path of the galaxy looking for balance.

257.character_design_description: Lone survivor of the Pirate attack on the Discipline Space Station.

258.character_design_description: Once first mate to Captain Swallow, this Pirate is now your loyal friend.

259.character_design_description: This Qtarian healer was once held captive on a Pirate vessel.

261.character_design_description: A lovable scoundrel, with a skill for cutting corners.

262.character_design_description: Uses a whole bottle of shampoo every day.

265.character_design_description: A brave warrior whose deeds have passed into legend.

268.character_design_description: Cute on the outside, delicious on the inside. Has several hundred siblings, each cuter than the last.

269.character_design_description: Pro-gamer and gourmet food extraordinaire. Also part-time SavySoda Emergency Response Personnel.

270.character_design_description: The legendary leader of the Ardent cabal, who oversees their actions as they explore our galaxy.

271.character_design_description: Resides in the mountains, designing secret weapons for the Federation.

272.character_design_description: A mysterious traveller with the prophetic power to gaze into the future.

273.character_design_description: A well-trained combatant from the Ardent Cabal. Skilled in both space warfare and hand-to-hand fighting.

276.character_design_description: Will the real TJ please stand up.

277.character_design_description: From the beautiful Rigel system. Only eats organic food.

278.character_design_description: He's so bad his opponents take extra damage from his attacks.

279.character_design_description: Never seen without his magic pencil; completely useless in the digital age.

281.character_design_description: A secret member of an ancient society. Likes playing with snakes.

282.character_design_description: Runs an illegal torrent site in her free time.

283.character_design_description: You can trust her with your life, just not with your wallet.

284.character_design_description: With her genius-level intellect, she could do anything she wants. All she wants to do is blow stuff up.

286.character_design_description: An avid stamp collector. Great with kids.

287.character_design_description: An amateur action novelist, looking to get some real life battle experience.

288.character_design_description: Don't let the Dracorpse's injuries fool you into thinking you have a chance. Just run.

289.character_design_description: An innocent civilian, afflicted by strange crystal growths.

290.character_design_description: A harmless civilian, afflicted by a strange crystal growth.

291.character_design_description: A citizen of the Federation. She enjoys smooth cappuccinos.

292.character_design_description: A citizen of the federation. Enjoys Avocado with brunch.

293.character_design_description: Has a tail and competes regularly in the iron man competition.

294.character_design_description: In truth, she's not that great of a shot, but she's so nice that everyone humours her.

295.character_design_description: Cute and capable, even if you can't tell where she's looking.

296.character_design_description: This intelligent young woman writes erotic novels in her leisure time. Very popular with the other recruits.

297.character_design_description: You never got this friendly young recruit's name, and at this point it's too late to ask.

299.character_design_description: The looker of his graduate class, unfortunately prone to busting out his guitar at parties.

300.character_design_description: A hybrid Zakian assassin, enslaved by strange crystal growths.

301.character_design_description: Named to differentiate him from the other two Toms, neither of whom you've met.

302.character_design_description: A hybrid Zakian assassin, enslaved by strange crystal growths.

303.character_design_description: A stray kitty that used up its last life.

304.character_design_description: ZAKI龍 Elder. 独领风骚. 8 time tournament title holder in 2018 Season - Nov 2018.

305.character_design_description: Contrary to popular rumour, this Qtarian does not have an actual robot tongue; she's just very polite.

306.character_design_description: This eager recruit is famous for fixing a gun array purely by headbutting it. Some say it left her a little odd, though.

307.character_design_description: Born into the role of a forge worker, this cool-headed Qtarian keeps samples of interesting alloys as a hobby.

308.character_design_description: The Qtarian is not the sharpest tool in the shed, but he makes up for it in sheer bloodyminded tenacity.

309.character_design_description: This Qtarian loves human fantasy novels; apparently, they burn better than any other kind of book.

310.character_design_description: This gregarious Qtarian became an astronaut not from a love of adventure, but from a deep hatred of dirt.

311.character_design_description: Ask anyone who knows him, he's not really mad. He's furious!

312.character_design_description: The role of this Grey is to unify experiments, set their living tempo, execute clear genetic patterns and critically shape the new life-form as it grows.

313.character_design_description: Regards others with an icy stare, before giving them the cold shoulder.

314.character_design_description: Job: Gray Curator. Pastime: Abducting animals for experimentation. Weakness: Terrible depth perception.

315.character_design_description: These Gray possess outstanding ability in creating living artwork from their experiments.

316.character_design_description: Dogs couldn't operate an MRI machine... but CATscan!

318.character_design_description: The grace and beauty of this lithe Ardent's movements belie his deadliness in combat.

319.character_design_description: This laconic heroine wields the traditional weapon of her people with enough skill to make it the equal of any modern blaster.

320.character_design_description: Has taken all of Santa's gifts to give to stray dogs in Proxima Centauri.

321.character_design_description: The real Eric is standing up - next to the server adding stuff.

322.character_design_description: Possibly the horniest guy in the galaxy. Also refuses to run at fast speeds to avoid creasing his fine suit.

323.character_design_description: A beautiful, mystical creature with healing powers.

328.character_design_description: A ghost of captains present. How does that work?

329.character_design_description: If he's got a bat, stand back! This guy hits like no one else!

330.character_design_description: First of the Zodiacs! Impetuosity is her trademark.

332.character_design_description: Loves the cold and damp, hates summer and French cuisine.

334.character_design_description: For a professional golfer, this tiger spends a lot of time in the woods.

335.character_design_description: Community Manager for Russia and Beyond!

336.character_design_description: The empty shell of a once-proud Qtarian. Fights with unfeeling brutality.

337.character_design_description: Master media manipulator. Never without a fire extinguisher for the multiple social media accounts.

338.character_design_description: Alien by day, Rice Dumpling by night! It's Zongzi-Man!

339.character_design_description: A mad scientist's obsession with rice dumplings led him to invent a strange contraption that is part droid and part rice dumpling.

340.character_design_description: An errant Ardent warrior on a quest to find secret technology that could save his home galaxy.

342.character_design_description: A genetic experiment, designed to produce an edible crop that could guard itself from scavengers.

343.character_design_description: The royal princess of a distant empire in search of her lost love. Has an unhealthy addiction to weaving.

344.character_design_description: A wanderer from a distant galaxy that herds Starcows for a living. Got lost in a wormhole, now trying to find his way home.

345.character_design_description: Can tell how powerful you are with her unique power detector.

346.character_design_description: Don't let his cute exterior fool you! This cyborg-assassin bunny can kill you armed with only snowballs.

347.character_design_description: An inspirational Federation leader, who quickly gives aid wherever needed to maintain her ship as a strategic asset on the battlefield.

348.character_design_description: The orphaned child of forgotten divinities. Isn't she cute? She hates you, all of you. So, so much.

349.character_design_description: Tournament reward for September 2019. This proud warrior has only one weakness: An unquenchable thirst for fine green tea.

350.character_design_description: Cold and inscrutable, her search for immortality has led her to knowledge best left forgotten...

351.character_design_description: A villainous warrior of The Eaten Alliance, she twists Visiri biomachinery into parasitic instruments of oppression and control.

352.character_design_description: Voted 'most likely to overthrow the empress' in her high-school yearbook. Her parents couldn't be more proud.

353.character_design_description: I was working in the lab, late one night, when my eyes beheld an eerie sight. For my ghost from his projector, began to rise. And suddenly to my surprise; He did the mash! He did the monster mash!

354.character_design_description: No vault is safe from this dashing thief. Open Sesame!

355.character_design_description: Superhero turkey who survived the trials of the oven.

357.character_design_description: Able to communicate with woodland creatures, this powerful but naive frost manipulator is the only person the galactic sprite doesn't completely hate.

358.character_design_description: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, had a very shiny nose, and if you ever saw it, you would even say it glows...

361.character_design_description: Seven times captured, seven times freed! A powerful warrior of the Three Kingdoms.

362.character_design_description: What could be more hardcore than eating your own eye? A courageous general of the Three Kingdoms.

363.character_design_description: Hero or traitor? You be the judge. A brave leader of the Three Kingdoms.

364.character_design_description: Shot through the heart, and you're to blame! You give love a bad name!

365.character_design_description: A Meowy who has shown great capability in aerial combat.

368.character_design_description: Wants to be where the people are.

369.character_design_description: The empty shell of a once-loyal Federation crewman. Seemingly feels nothing.

370.character_design_description: Honestly, you don't notice much difference.

371.character_design_description: This withered wreck shows no trace of the brilliant leader that once inhabited its form.

372.character_design_description: Losing his mind actually seems to have been a step up for Swallow.

374.character_design_description: His engineering skills are outta this world!

376.character_design_description: Smells like heaven, fights like hell! It's Zongzi-Woman!

377.character_design_description: This mythical creature appears only when the saltiest of tears are shed.

378.character_design_description: Rides to work. Prefers a yellow jersey.

381.character_design_description: Born on the 7th, he is the favorite son of the Grandfather. - Sponsored by Techbarr

382.character_design_description: Finally, the legendary Ardent general has awakened. - Sponsored by Ayalan

383.character_design_description: When a Legendary Conjoint Gray falls, their mind is housed in a mechanical sanctuary. Some still believe this to be a form of afterlife in the eyes of 'ancient science'. - Sponsored by The Conjoint

384.character_design_description: Cybernetic Personal Unit. A jailbroken synth programmed by a highly intelligent frog. What's so great about a frog programming a synth? No bugs! - Sponsored by Havøk

385.character_design_description: A Synth and Snek duo that worked their way up to Admiral. Also oversees a Synth Night Club in spare time. - Sponsored by Dolores

386.character_design_description: Is all out of Bubblegum... - Sponsored by Jean

387.character_design_description: A merciless commander from a distant ocean world. His journey leaves only devastation and sorrow… and fish. - Sponsored by Phongril

388.character_design_description: Here to avenge his pumpkin brethren! Let's see how you like being a lantern.

389.character_design_description: A humble droid ready to serve its wise master.

390.character_design_description: A heavy defender droid ready to stop intruders.

391.character_design_description: An aggressive droid looking to cause havoc.

392.character_design_description: A rare Synth from the first Age of Expansion! These relics would operate Colonial Cryo-ships for long voyages to distant Stars.

393.character_design_description: Earned the favour of the empress by winning a gunfight with her bare hands.

394.character_design_description: Knighted by the pirate empress herself, his reckless piloting style terrifies friend and foe alike.

395.character_design_description: Once a mere waitress, she served a cocktail so delicious the empress knighted her on the spot.

396.character_design_description: A common Trudy model synth, enhanced with hardened knuckles and an expanded swear word database.

397.character_design_description: Six years as a warden on a prison satellite gave him an iron will and some very impressive scars.

398.character_design_description: Won his promotion in a game of cards with his old captain.

399.character_design_description: Living example of why you don't multitask while holding a welding torch.

400.character_design_description: Built to labour on airless moons, this hardy synth much prefers hanging out in a breathable atmosphere.

401.character_design_description: Born and raised on a mining rig, this plucky Qtarian could fly a ship before he learned to walk.

402.character_design_description: Hardened by a hundred sorties, this Flying Ace has never lost a dogfight. - Sponsored by Joel Fawkes

403.character_design_description: Specialist Sound and Sonar Scanning Synth Scholar.

404.character_design_description: A galactic traveller who thinks he's a ghost! Has a keen interest in all things tech.

405.character_design_description: An advanced alien lifeform, Penny hates dog jokes. What a wiener.

406.character_design_description: Renowned for winning an impossible battle: 12 vs 130 ships! He has passed through time and space to serve his King, bringing peace to the galaxy. - Sponsored by L＇ Fall In

407.character_design_description: Renowned as a righteous man and acrobat in the Josun-Dynasty. He could not call his father father, nor could he call his brother brother. Later became the king of Yuldo. - Sponsored by L´ HoneyBearHB

408.character_design_description: Renowned as a noble scholar in the Josun-Dynasty. Held in high esteem for his strong character and eagerness to learn. 'Not practicing on your own is like desperation'. - Sponsored by L´ Kimchipower

409.character_design_description: King Sejong the Great invented the Korean alphabet for the two reasons: First, to write every sound in the world. Second, so his people could learn to read. - Sponsored by L´ Archon

410.character_design_description: Reinforced Evacuation Droid. This shy guy is programmed to brace and protect, helping others to escape. 15 Tonnes of fun!

411.character_design_description: This simple but sweet Synth is well known for being on a constant sugar rush.

412.character_design_description: A famous poet of the fishfolk, adored galaxywide for his moving poem, 'Blub glub bloop.'

413.character_design_description: A multilimbed menace from a waterlogged world, working his way up through the ranks of HYDRA.

417.character_design_description: Petty and pugnacious, with a penchant for pyromania. As expected of a synth designed by Grays.

423.character_design_description: Savy's old server droid, who was exiled after catching fire one too many times.

424.character_design_description: Programmed to be the ultimate assassin, which can be a tough job with no depth perception.

425.character_design_description: Fluent in over 1200 languages, all of them extinct.

427.character_design_description: Ridiculously radical Imperial Robots, raging against representation.

428.character_design_description: A restored Animatronic President that cannot lie. Caution: Handle Aware.

429.character_design_description: A restored Animatronic President of the People, by the People, for the People.

431.character_design_description: Kneel down, mortal. Let everything go back to 'None,' destroy! - Sponsored by River wind

432.character_design_description: Piano Shops require heavy tie-ups with Space Banks! Justice for musicians! - Sponsored by IG~mbluehawk

433.character_design_description: Exiled and vilified, this empress embraces the demoness identity thrust upon her. She will incinerate all who stand in the way of her rise from the ashes. - Sponsored by Admiral Col

434.character_design_description: Click clack, get back! - Sponsored by Mitto

435.character_design_description: Don't get too close! The Succubus' charms will enchant brave captains, turning them into mindless playthings! - Sponsored by 圣歌祈祷

436.character_design_description: Destroying you is none of your business. - Sponsored by 宇宙意志

437.character_design_description: A powerful psionic consciousness, inhabiting a cloud of methane. Seriously, stop calling it a 'fart elemental'!

438.character_design_description: Rides to the Olympics. Prefers an Olympic jersey.

440.character_design_description: Ccu-u-uddlin8g tThi- [File Corrupted] -ul29d bbbe 8a p8ai- [File Corrupted] -is55t8akee.

441.character_design_description: The host of a Hive-Mind as vast as it is incomprehensible. It knows much, but tells maddeningly little.

446.character_design_description: In the name of the Moon, she punishes the unjust!

447.character_design_description: An Inspiration for millions, this peppy pilot is leading the charge on extraterrestrial exploration!

448.character_design_description: For the glory of Saturn, she liberates the oppressed!

449.character_design_description: Being dissolved in mutagenic slime has done nothing to curb this young warrior's sense of adventure.

451.character_design_description: This deviously clever Synth is a sly, gift-stealing machine!

452.character_design_description: What unspeakable torments could inspire such a monstrous creation? ...Oh, Xmas shopping. Right.

453.character_design_description: Architect of the invasion, an artificial construct equal parts ingenious and insane.

454.character_design_description: A seasoned hunter of malicious machines, throw a few bux his way.

455.character_design_description: A former Commando of the ruthless Forward Landing Unit: F1. Last spotted directing eggspeditionary forces mercilessly attacking peaceful galactic settlements.

456.character_design_description: Unstable genetic architecture allows the Visiri to adapt to new environs over a few short generations. Fascinating.

457.character_design_description: A prodigious psychic talent, enhanced by repeated brain tissue grafts, allows this skilled pilot to control a vessel with thought alone.

461.character_design_description: Experimented on by the mysterious Gray, this Apex predator is sowing discord across the Galaxy! - Inspired by Apex

462.character_design_description: Goddess of healing and patron deity of the feline races.

463.character_design_description: This treacherous android makes a brilliant ally; just don't let your guard down around him, or you might get burnt.

464.character_design_description: The darker spirit of the team, Mercury wields the power of Null, the Void and Dark Matter. At least Moona seems to think she's okay!

465.character_design_description: Most dismiss her as a fool, but she always gets the last laugh...

466.character_design_description: An enigma formed out of star matter found drifting through space. - Sponsored by Jackie5x5

467.character_design_description: All's fair in love and war, but football is a different matter altogether.

468.character_design_description: The tyrannical terror of the Tartarus tundra. Ironically, he has zero chill.

471.character_design_description: The nicest virus you'd find inside us.

472.character_design_description: The best athlete in the entire naval heirarchy, with the possible exception of her sister Serena.

473.character_design_description: Warden of the enigmatic Black Depths, Tylord guides countless lost vessels back to safety - Inspired by Tylo Ren

474.character_design_description: The Ursa Major constellation is sectored off by Warning Transmission: DO NOT poke the Bear! - Inspired by Kane Rizzel

475.character_design_description: A heavy dose of nova radiation has given this wilting flower a new lease on life!

476.character_design_description: A passionate man who spends his time discovering and cataloguing any new bugs he can find amongst the stars.

477.character_design_description: A devious leader thrown forward through spacetime. He could Teach us a few things. - Inspired by Blkbeard

478.character_design_description: A rebellious rev-head roo with a literal lead foot.

479.character_design_description: Speedily serves suds with a smile!

480.character_design_description: Move fast and break things. If this fails, move faster and break more things!

481.character_design_description: The most spiritual member of the team. Mars is never far from her two pet magpies, Phobos and Deimos.

482.character_design_description: Ready to take the leap into the dark abyss, unless, something else leaps back?

483.character_design_description: This infamous pilot is said to have cat-like reflexes. She doesn't talk much, but wherever she's going you can hear a faint polyphonic purr. - Inspired by The worst.

486.character_design_description: Despite the corroded circuits and fridge-shaped head he will clear away your mess without a fuss (mostly). Occasionally slips into 'sarcasm mode'. - Inspired by Nova 5

488.character_design_description: Art is not a Science - it's an Engineering.

489.character_design_description: Chosen by the Dragon Emperor to bring desolation in his name.

490.character_design_description: Actually fairly easy to put back together again. Heat-treated plating and hard-boiled contents significantly increase ovenproofing.

491.character_design_description: Crafted for the courts, born to ball.

492.character_design_description: The only jelly that eats you right back!

493.character_design_description: These robots are great if you want something blown up, and terrible if you don't want something blown up.

494.character_design_description: Had a hard life, but always ready to crack a smile.

495.character_design_description: A well-trained combatant from the Ardent Cabal. Skilled in both space warfare and hand-to-hand fighting.

497.character_design_description: Retrofitted with earth-moving machinery, Steady was an Animatronic President whose real name and origin have been lost to time.

501.character_design_description: Always seems to have a soccer ball on his person. Where is he keeping them?

502.character_design_description: Secretly dreams of performing a slam dunk from upper orbit.

503.character_design_description: Master of the Sosaiken fighting school. Widely regarded as the greatest martial artist alive.

504.character_design_description: Billy's twin brother. Not the greatest martial artist alive, but possibly the most enthusiastic.

505.character_design_description: Billy's girlfriend, a gifted student of the Sosaiken martial school. Even tougher than she looks.

506.character_design_description: Head enforcer of the Shadow Warriors crime gang. No act is too despicable, as long as the pay is good.

507.character_design_description: Flyspray isn't going to cut it with this one.

508.character_design_description: By the honour of Jupiter, she protects the weak!

509.character_design_description: This clever kittus considers the term pet offensive, but still accepts payment in tinned tuna and pats.

510.character_design_description: Stewards of the old colony ships, these rudimentary synths tended to the needs of the sleeping crew on their century-long voyages between Stars.

511.character_design_description: Fir-ocious and pine-ing for chaos, this sentient Christmas tree is the ultimate villain. Deck the halls with doom and needle your enemies with terror!

512.character_design_description: An ordinary snake in extraordinary times, Franklin's patterned scales give the appearance of being covered in embers.

513.character_design_description: The most foul, cruel and bad tempered rodent you've ever set eyes on - with a vicious streak a mile wide!
